name: Mission Of Programmer
description:
Our poor programmer Sid Woodrow lost his job in Cincinnati, one of the most famous cities in Hell. 

With no choice but to return to his hometown, Rockdale, he is going to inherit his grandfather's untouched land.  

In other words, Sid is about to start his own farming life...

The game was created for My First Game Jam: Summer 2022.

NOT COMPLETED, CONTAINS BUGS AND LIMITED FUNCTIONALITIES!

Controls:

  • WASD -> Move
  • Left Click -> Select item & use item
  • E -> Continue the dialogue
  • Q -> Open & close bag
  • T -> Fast forward (minutes)
